attributes.action: A dog licence for all dog owners in the country off course there will be a fee
attributes.additional_details: Stop this xl bullie ban and any other dog ban that isn’t already in place ie pit bulls will remain banned and I  own a pit bull cross American bulldog but you currently have 1 dlo officer at each police station and it takes two to do the check so that’s another police station which has to get involved too the backlog will be immense you’ll need 12 officers to deal with it and a dedicated court room to deal with it with an already stretched legal system
attributes.background: Every dog should be on a licence which can be a charge and your dog should be classed as a lethal weapon and if your dog attacks any other dog adult or worse a child thrn that owner should be done for going equipped yhe law is already there let’s use it and if the fog does it 2 X it gets put down

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign: Bring back a Dog Licence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650
